name: Virago
Lore: 'Prototype designed by MandalMotors to Prince Xizor''s exacting specifications. Contains four seperate power generators to power advanced flight controls and engines.',
Text: 'Permanent Pilot provides 1 ability. May add Xizor as pilot (suspends permanent pilot). Xizor deploys -3 aboard. When Xizor piloting, adds one battle destiny and immune to attrition < 5.',
